page.title: 20F of D Berry Hill Sport
page.content: {Berry Hill has a very good rugby team that plays in the rugby union.Recent matches have been played against Cardiff,Bath,Bristol,Lydney and Bournemouth.There are four other teams that play local clubs.They train on a {Tuesday and a Thursday.Training {includes situps,pressups,jogging,leap- {frogging,passing and tackling.The junior team play mini-rugby at Gloucester,Stroud and Loughborough. They train on a Monday night.The Berry Hill pitch is full size,floodlit and has its own club.The kit is coloured black and{amber.The football {team plays in the local league.There {is a Berry Hill skittles team}that play in the public houses.The{Wimbury {Clog Dancers}practice in the Christchurch schoolrooms and perform in local venues.
